short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Play Fancy Pants - Unblocked & Free as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!

short.el: Παίξτε το Fancy Pants - Αποκλεισμένο και Δωρεάν, ως πρόσθετο του Chrome. Μπορείτε επίσης να παίξετε χωρίς σύνδεση στο ίντερνετ,…

short.fil: I-play ang Fancy Pants - Hindi nakaharang at Libre bilang Chrome extension - Maaaring I-play din nang walang Internet, subukan na!

short.it: Gioca a Fancy Pants - Sbloccato e gratuito come estensione per Chrome - Puoi anche giocare senza Internet, prova adesso!
short.ja: クロム拡張機能としてプレイしている「Fancy Pants - Unblocked & Free」を楽しんでください。また、インターネット接続なしでもプレイできます。今すぐ試してみてください！
short.ko: 크롬 확장 프로그램으로 차단 해제되고 무료로 팬시 팬츠를 플레이해보세요. 인터넷이없어도 플레이할 수도 있습니다. 지금 확인해보세요!

short.sr: Играјте Fancy Pants - Неблокирано и бесплатно као Хромов додатак - Исто тако, можете играти без интернета, пробајте одмах!

short.th: เล่น Fancy Pants - Unblocked & ฟรีเป็นส่วนขยายของ Chrome - สามารถเล่นได้โดยไม่ต้องเชื่อมต่ออินเทอร์เน็ตเลย ลองเล่นเดี๋ยวนี้!

short.uk: Грайте Fancy Pants - Unblocked & Free як розширення для Chrome - також можна грати без Інтернету, спробуйте зараз!
short.vi: Chơi Fancy Pants - Mở khóa và Miễn phí như một tiện ích Chrome - Cũng có thể Chơi mà không cần kết nối Internet, thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 以Chrome扩展程序形式畅玩Fancy Pants - 无需解锁与免费 - 也可离线游玩，现在试试吧！
short.zh_TW: 玩精緻褲 - 可解鎖且免費的 Chrome 擴充功能 - 也可以在沒有網路的情況下遊玩，立即試試看！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Play other games on the top-left menu.
Fancy Pants: Unleash Your Inner Adventurer in this Unblocked & Free Platformer Extravaganza! 🕹️🏃‍♂️

Embark on a whimsical journey with Fancy Pants, the unblocked and free-to-play platformer that combines smooth, acrobatic gameplay with a dash of humor and a whole lot of style!

Game Features:

Unblocked and Free: Fancy Pants is your passport to a world of adventure without any restrictions. Dive into the game hassle-free and explore the vibrant, hand-drawn landscapes at no cost. 🆓🎮

Slick Platforming Action: Experience the joy of fluid, dynamic movement as you guide Fancy Pants through a series of fast-paced levels filled with jumps, slides, and epic stunts. 🏰🏃‍♂️

Beautifully Crafted Worlds: Traverse through beautifully illustrated worlds, each with its own unique challenges and hidden secrets. From the sprawling hills to the mysterious caverns, every location is a visual treat. 🌈🌍

Customizable Fancy Pants: Give your character a touch of personal flair by customizing his pants and unlocking various outfits. Show off your style as you conquer each level with finesse. 👖🕶️

Epic Boss Battles: Prepare for showdowns with quirky and challenging bosses that will test your platforming skills to the limit. Can you outmaneuver them and emerge victorious? 🤺👾

Time Trials and Challenges: If you're up for an extra challenge, try your hand at time trials and special challenges scattered throughout the game. Test your speed and agility for extra rewards! ⏱️🏆
